sli.name: user-api_http_requests_total
sli.help: Total number of HTTP requests to user-api.

sli.name: user-api_request_errors_total
sli.help: Total number of errors (HTTP status codes >= 500) for all requests to user-api.

sli.name: user-api_request_success_count
sli.help: Count of successful requests (HTTP status code 2xx) to user-api.

explanation: SLIs were derived from availability objectives for each component in user-api using Prometheus metrics. Targets are measured over a 30-day window.
llm_suggestions: Consider adding latency SLIs for comprehensive performance tracking.
Set up burn-rate alerts to catch SLO violations early.
